statusDescription.Public: visible in the StartMonday mobile apps and in your career site widget
statusDescription.InviteOnly: only visible to candidates with whom you have shared a link
statusDescription.Inactive: the job is temporarily invisible to all job seekers, but your hiring pipeline remains as-is
statusDescription.Archived: removed from jobs list (all candidates in the pipeline must be removed first)

pipeline.undoNotice: This candidate has already been {{decision}} - you may move them back into the pipeline, but of course if they have been notified already, there is no way to undo that now. You may need to contact them and explain. Proceed?
pipeline.inboxStageEmpty: Added candidates appear here when you're not yet ready to contact them. Add candidates by clicking "Add Candidate" in the upper right of this screen. Drag candidates out of here when you have contacted them to advance them to other pipeline stages.
pipeline.videoStageEmpty: Drag candidates here to automatically invite them submit a video.
pipeline.autoContactNotice: Moving this candidate out of the inbox may prompt automated contact. Are you sure?
